ygData.subject: RE: Gargoyle Island in OOT
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Lol. The elf hide gloves are much better than anything I had at the time. And I didn t have the +3 STR earrings. I did have a pair of cutthroat rings and
ygData.messageBody:
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Joshua R. Moore [mailto:josh@...]
> Sent: Thursday, February 17, 2000 8:39 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Gargoyle Island in OOT
>
>
> From: "Joshua R. Moore" <josh@...>
>
> I sure as heck didnt have the best equipment in the world. At
> the time I had
> Black iron leggings, a basalt Carapace, Black Iron arms,
> bronze Bracers, elf
> hide gloves, raw hid cloak and bronze boots with some +3
> strength earrings

Lol. The elf hide gloves are much better than anything I had at the time.
And I didn't have the +3 STR earrings. I did have a pair of cutthroat rings
and maybe 1 magical earring, but I think it was a +3 CHA.

I only recently got the Carapace, but it's sitting in the bank waiting for
the day I get a gypsy lute. :-)

---Windleaf, 29th, Bertox
